item.description:
Marco Odermatt pushed his Alpine World Cup giant slalom winning streak to 12 in swashbuckling style, storming from third place after the first run to win again in Aspen. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/4rztnFthtr pic.twitter.com/mFMft5vuAA

item.description:
A goal blitz set up Simba of Tanzania to trounce Jwaneng Galaxy of Botswana 6-0 on Saturday, seal a CAF Champions League quarter-finals place and eliminate Wydad Casablanca of Morocco. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/u5ketXpm15 pic.twitter.com/nLtrT9eqCH
